question: Sundri, agar, rhizophora, screw pines, canes and palms are found in which of the following forests?
explanation: Sundri, agar, rhizophora, screw pines, canes and palms are found in littoral and swamp. Swamp forests in India are confined to the deltas of the Ganga, the Mahanadi, the Godavari, the Krishna and the Cauvery.
